Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: If you see something suspicious, bomb it!

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.
